Play:
The Double Suicide at Ikudama
(Ikudama shinjū / 生玉心中)

Written By: Chikamatsu Monzaemon (近松門左衛門)

First Staged: 1715

Reference: Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 237, February 1985; Bunraku February 1993 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

February 1985: The Double Suicide at Ikudama

February 1993: The Double Suicide at Ikudama

Characters:

Osaga (Kashiwaya Osaga / 柏屋おさが)

Rustic customer (Inaka kyaku / 田舎客)

Palanquin bearer (Kagoya / 駕屋)

Tea house madam (Kasha / 花車)

Kaheiji (Chawanya Kaheiji / 茶碗屋嘉平次)

Kaheiji's elder sister (Kaheiji ane / 嘉平次姉)

Ikumatsu (Otōto Ikumatsu / 弟幾松)

Otake (Meshitaki Otake / 飯炊きお竹)

Chosaku (Indenya Chōsaku / 印伝屋長作)

Apprentice (Mukai no decchi / 迎いの丁稚)

Clerk (Konya no tedai / 紺屋の手代)

Seisuke (Wakaimono Seisuke / 若い者清介)

Gohei (Oya Gohei / 親五兵衛)

Okiwa (Iinazuke Okiwa / 許婚おきわ)
